pages.title: Ore Farming
pages.text: there's $(thing)Toretoises$() spawning underground? You can mine their ores with a pickaxe, and if you feed them $(item)Glow Berries$(), they grow right back!
Use the $(thing)Toretoises$() to generate ore automatically.$(br2)You can even use the same thing you use to break blocks automatically with them.
